content.body: What should I read to learn why ECMA-402 `DisplayNames` has both "short" and "narrow" style when the expected data source (CLDR) seems to have only one kind of short?
content.formatted_body: What should I read to learn why ECMA-402 DisplayNames has both "short" and "narrow" style when the expected data source (CLDR) seems to have only one kind of short?
